mapper.select: SELECT pc.PATH_CTRL_ID, pc.PATH, pc.STATUS, pc.CREATEDATE, pc.MODIFYDATE, pc.MODIFYBY, pc.REMARKS, urpc.ROLE_ID FROM PATH_CTRL pc inner join USER_ROLE_PATH_CTRL urpc on urpc.PATH_CTRL_ID = pc.PATH_CTRL_ID inner join USER_ROLE ur on ur.ROLE_ID = urpc.ROLE_ID where pc.STATUS = #{status} order by urpc.ROLE_ID, pc.PATH

SELECT pc.PATH_CTRL_ID, pc.PATH, pc.STATUS, pc.DESCRIPTION, urpc.ROLE_ID FROM PATH_CTRL pc INNER JOIN USER_ROLE_PATH_CTRL urpc ON urpc.PATH_CTRL_ID = pc.PATH_CTRL_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM USER_ROLE WHERE STATUS = #{status} START WITH ROLE_ID = #{roleId} CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENT_ROLE_ID = ROLE_ID ) ur ON ur.ROLE_ID = urpc.ROLE_ID ORDER BY urpc.ROLE_ID, pc.PATH
select PATH_CTRL_ID,PATH,STATUS,DESCRIPTION from PATH_CTRL where STATUS = 'A'
mapper.insert:
insert all
into USER_ROLE_PATH_CTRL(ROLE_ID, PATH_CTRL_ID, CREATEBY) values (#{roleId}, #{pathCtrlId}, #{createby})

mapper.delete: delete USER_ROLE_PATH_CTRL where ROLE_ID = #{roleId} and PATH_CTRL_ID = #{pathCtrlId}
